message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 5-a-2, translated into en
data:
The Methodology used by countries for the compilation of the data at the national level (https://www.fao.org/3/i8785en/I8785EN.pdf) and the

questionnaires provided to countries include guidance, definitions and instructions.

  • Technical support provided by FAO to the representatives and legal experts from the designated responsible institutions
  • E-learning available in the FAO learning academy https://elearning.fao.org/course/view.php?id=364
